inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: at least 20 teeth, including 4 first molars and 4 first or second premolars

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: attending an appointment in a centre participating to the trial

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: affiliated to a health insurance scheme

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: giving his informed consent and accepting the modalities of the study

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: agreeing to attend up to 4 appointments dedicated to the study, during 8 weeks after the initial appointment

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: in possession of an internet-enabled smartphone or tablet

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: agreeing to be registered within the system of text-based recalls for the duration of the study

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no previous oral hygiene motivation session less than 1 year ago

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no calculus removal procedure less than 1 month ago

notes: Patient has tinea pedis infection, confirmed by microscopic KOH wet mount examination. No underlying disease or allergies mentioned.
